welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Preakness, a charming city known for its historic landmarks and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all the unique offerings this city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is home to Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to JetBlue.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves all domestic flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network by selecting 'HPN Free WiFi' from the list of available networks.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves international flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for JetBlue Airways

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport
